body: - Fix adaptive icons bug on Android 8+

- UI changes
- Physical keyboard initial support

Changes in 0.5.5:
- Custom icon support.
- Simplified Chinese translation (Thanks to Monyxie).
- Indonesian translation (Thanks to Fijar).

Changes in 0.5.4:
- Added fast scroll.
- Main bar can be moved to the bottom.
- German translation (Thanks to Thomas Blankenburg).
- Dutch translation (Thanks to David Smit).
- Bug fixes and minor improvements.

- Bug fixes;
- Now it's possible to preview changes on color preferences.

- Color picker improvement;
- Polish translation (Thanks to Daria Szatan).
